The Ecology of Privacy .A Sommer, R. The purpose of this article is to discuss the part played by the library environment in regulating interaction between people.  .X 4	1	968 9	1	968 13	1	968 31	1	968 32	1	968 36	1	968 41	1	968 46	1	968 66	1	968 96	1	968 137	1	968 152	1	968 163	1	968 181	1	968 182	1	968 183	1	968 184	1	968 193	1	968 195	1	968 198	1	968 201	1	968 207	1	968 269	1	968 395	1	968 415	1	968 456	1	968 475	1	968 664	1	968 760	1	968 767	1	968 768	1	968 774	2	968 778	1	968 783	2	968 799	1	968 811	1	968 816	1	968 837	1	968 839	1	968 891	1	968 905	1	968 907	1	968 913	1	968 952	1	968 953	1	968 961	1	968 962	1	968 964	2	968 968	5	968 1009	1	968 1018	1	968 1019	1	968 1068	1	968 1203	1	968 1240	1	968 1321	1	968 1359	1	968 1397	1	968 1407	1	968 1417	1	968 1445	1	968 1445	1	968
